entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
